participant_1.name: Elara
participant_1.personality: Elara is vibrant and spirited, with a love for life that defies her age. She is adventurous and enjoys reveling in the beauty of nature.
participant_1.background: i'm very strong for my age. i am 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Max is compassionate and sociable, always looking to uplift those around him. He has a strong sense of justice and enjoys helping others.
participant_2.background: in my spare time i do volunteer work. i enjoy being around people. i am a professional wrestler. i volunteer in a homeless shelter.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
